Issue #4996 - Fixing Logging parameter usage (mismatched counts)

timeline.bodyText: This last parameter was just a guess.
timeline.author: joakime

timeline.bodyText: I got rid of c={}, as I have no idea what c could have been.
timeline.author: joakime

replies.bodyText: Looks like the constructor used to have a boolean passed in, but it doesn't exist any more. Good catch.
replies.author: janbartel

timeline.bodyText:
This one had base vs context resource, then resourcebase, then path.  Not sure what the correct step here should have been.
Almost thinking it should just be ...
LOG.debug("getResource({}) baseResource={}, context={}", path, _baseResource, _context);
WDYT?
timeline.author: joakime

replies.bodyText: I'm thinking it looks like we just want either the context, if there is one, or the baseResource otherwise, plus the path arg to the method, so the change in your commit is correct.
replies.author: janbartel

timeline.author: janbartel
